price: (20) Those who fulfill the covenant of Allāh and do not break the contract,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
